com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive
Class AbstractArchiveMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.AbstractArchiveMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.AssemblerConfigurationSource, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
FullSourceArchiveMojo, JavaScriptSourceArchiveMojo, JavaSourceArchiveMojo, ProcessedJavaScriptArchiveMojo
public abstract class AbstractArchiveMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.AssemblerConfigurationSource

Essentially the same as the Assembly Plugin Mojo, with a convenience function to have the src assembly xml files set up for you already. Unfortunately there is no way to extend from one plugin space to another within the plexus system, so I copied the entire Mojo. This is just to help automate and minimize the amount of code in the poms.
